level.heading: PUBLIC HEALTH[COLON] PUBLIC ACCOMMODATION ENDORSEMENT (ยง 17-510)

level.text: The Director shall charge fees for business license categories with a Public Health: Public Accommodations endorsement as follows:

Source: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 4654 (May 28, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 8792 (September 24, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12191, 12198 (December 24, 2010).
